the.nss.boys.blog.rest

Class ArticleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • the.nss.boys.blog.rest.ArticleController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/articles")
public class ArticleController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest controller for Article Creates, Reads, Edits and Deletes data via Http requests
